Package gobblin.converter.avro

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvroFieldRetrieverConverter
    A converter class where the input is an Avro record, and the output is a specific field in that record.
    AvroRecordToAvroWritableConverter
    A Converter that takes an Avro GenericRecord and converts it to AvroGenericRecordWritable.
    AvroToAvroCopyableConverter
    Implementation of Converter that takes in an Avro Schema and GenericRecord and returns a CopyableSchema and a CopyableGenericRecord.
    JsonElementConversionFactory
    Creates a JsonElement to Avro converter for all supported data types.
    JsonElementConversionFactory.ArrayConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.BinaryConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.BooleanConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.ComplexConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.DateConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.DoubleConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.EnumConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.FloatConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.IntConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.JsonElementConverter
    Converts a JsonElement into a supported AvroType
    JsonElementConversionFactory.LongConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.MapConverter  
    JsonElementConversionFactory.StringConverter  
    JsonIntermediateToAvroConverter
    Converts Integra's intermediate data format to avro
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JsonElementConversionFactory.Type  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnsupportedDateTypeException
